movie_description: A grieving family grapples with the psychological terrors after the death of their matriarch.
A Black man visits his white girlfriend's parents for the weekend, where he discovers a sinister truth about their family.
A television crew follows firefighters into a quarantined apartment building and witnesses something horrifying.
After Thanos decimates half of all life in the universe, the Avengers must assemble once more to undo the damage and confront the Mad Titan.
With Spider-Man's secret identity revealed, Peter Parker asks Doctor Strange for help. The spell tears a hole in the multiverse, unleashing dangerous foes from alternate realities.
T'Challa, heir to the hidden Wakandan kingdom, must confront a challenger from his country's past when he is sworn in as king.
The true story of Oskar Schindler, a German businessman who saved the lives of over a thousand Jews during the Holocaust.
Andy Dufresne, a seemingly ordinary man convicted of murder, is sent to Shawshank prison. Over the course of two decades, he befriends a fellow inmate and devises a plan for escape.
The story of a loyal Akita dog who waits for his owner to return from work at a train station every day, even after his owner dies.
